snippet: The president and chief executive officer of ITT Exelis finds that his 32-year military career was invaluable preparation for corporate life.
abstract: Elizabeth Olson The Boss column features David F Melcher, president and chief executive officer of ITT Exelis; Melcher finds that his 32-year military career has proved to be invaluable preparation for corporate life.
lead_paragraph: The president and chief executive officer of ITT Exelis finds that his 32-year military career was invaluable preparation for corporate life.

headline.seo: David Melcher of ITT Exelis, on What the Army Taught Him

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
